fgeo.tool 0.0.0.9005
  • Reference
  • fgeo

Reference

Import ForestGEO data

read_vft() read_taxa()

Import ViewFullTable and ViewTaxonomy from .tsv or .csv files.

Import multiple files from a directory into a list

Notice that function names have the format input_output

rdata_list() rda_list() rds_list() csv_list() delim_list() tsv_list()

Import multiple files (.csv, excel, .Rdata, ...) from a directory into a list.

read_with()

Import multiple files into a list using any given reading function.

Export a list as multiple files in a directory

Notice that function names have the format input_output

list_csv()

Export mapping each dataframe in a list to a corresponding .csv file.

list_df()

Help export a single file by reducing a list of dataframes to a single one.

Edit data in place

sanitize_vft() sanitize_taxa()

Modify ViewFullTable and ViewTaxonomy to fix common data-structure issues.

fill_na()

Modify vectors, dataframes, or matrices to fill missing values.

lookup()

Modify a vector to replace old with new values from a lookup table.

Pick/drop rows with matching conditions

pick()

Pick rows from ForestGEO censuses in a list.

pick_dbh_min() pick_dbh_max() pick_dbh_under() pick_dbh_over() pick_status() drop_status()

Pick and drop rows of a ForestGEO ViewFullTable or census table.

pick_main_stem() pick_main_stemid()

Pick the main stem or main stemid(s) of each tree in each census.

pick_plotname()

Pick the given or first (alpha sorted) plot from a ViewFullTable.

pick_recensus()

Pick rows from table x with no-match in table y (e.g. find recensused trees).

pick_top()

Pick dataframe rows by matching n values from the head (or tail) of column.

Add new columns to a dataframe

add_id()

Add column id to a dataframe by pasting values from other columns.

add_status_tree()

Add column status_tree based on the status of all stems of each tree.

add_subquad()

Add column subquadrat based on qx and qy coordinates.

add_lxly() add_qxqy() add_index() add_col_row() add_hectindex() add_quad() add_col_row2()

Add columns lx/ly; QX/QY; index; col/row; and hectindex, quad.

Create different classes of ForestGEO data

as_censuses()

Create objects of class censuses_*, where * depends on the input.

fgeo_elevation()

Structure elevation data.

Objects exported from other packages

reexports

Objects exported from other packages

  • Import multiple files from a directory into a list
  • Export a list as multiple files in a directory
